tool_description: Retrieve a smart contract's abi by smart contract address
name: Smart Contract ABI
title: Smart Contract ABI

api_list.name: Get specific
api_list.description: Get registered smart contract by contract address

api_list.name: Get All
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-contract-abi.p.rapidapi.com/contract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-contract-abi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-contract-abi.p.rapidapi.com/contract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-contract-abi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
